website_summaries.verdict: Anker's Soundcore Life NC earphones deliver some serious bass depth and some less serious noise cancellation, but at $100, it's hard to complain.
pros: Powerful audio performance with boosted bass and sculpted highs
Can be used in wired, passive mode
cons: Sound signature not for those seeking accurate audio

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: So far, I appreciate the improved sound quality over my LG Tone. I do miss the retractable earbuds though. The controls are intuative, and I've been told I can be heard clearly. That's something I had a big problem with on my LG Tone. Overall I'm happy with the product. I do hope a future version will have retractable earbuds... or at least a way to magnetically anchor the earbud(s) to the device (vs the other ear bud) when not in use. Sometimes I just want to wear 1 earbud without the other flopping around.
customer_reviews.author: peacefuldays

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I had some trouble connecting via bluetooth at first but it was an issue on my device's end because of low battery / battery saver. Once I resolved that I was able to connect with multiple devices at the same time. The battery life is pretty good depending on how much usage. I am able to use it for a full day typically while using it frequently for phone calls and occasionally for music. The transparency mode does bring down the audio volume which I didn't realize at first but that does make sense. The noise cancelling does work.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok but only lasted 3 months. I keep trying different brands and pretty much think they all stink.
customer_reviews.author: kansas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect $100 headset for a 1-2 month time period
customer_reviews.text: All, I would not recommend this product to anyone. I purchased the product on July 22 and by the end of August the Blue tooth capability stopped working completely. So I complained and asked for a replacement set. I received the replacement set almost immediately ~Aug 22-ish.....Low and Behold the second set did the exact same thing on Sept 28. I am going to try to get something back but I won't be buying a Sound Core product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless headphones, although the neckband is a little too big for me. Overall it's a great product, not sure about moisture wicking.
customer_reviews.author: Primemember83

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headset in a comfortable form factor.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about these headphones except for the missing mute button. I would recommend these headphones to anyone looking for great sound and excellent call quality in a neckband form factor.
customer_reviews.author: mitchh24

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had this neckband for several weeks now and I am very impressed with it. It is slightly heavier than some other ones out there but I actually do appreciate the heft. I keep the neckband under my shirt collar and the weight keeps it from moving around or falling out as I move about. The sound quality is very good. The signal range is excellent. The battery life is very close to the specification. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: CatchPhotons

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Bose QC35s but was looking for something more portable for travel. I was extremely impressed with the audio quality of these and, short of a side by side comparison, found the noise cancellation to work great on the airplane. I had also tried a competitors version of these and returned them due to relatively poor sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a hearing loss and this makes it so much easier for him to hear conversations.
customer_reviews.author: egtc

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancelation, that's it
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality on their end is poor in windy situations. Personal noise cancelation is great, even on plane rides! The material the headset is made out of will peal. Mine quit working after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ross

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, excellent battery life, very comfortable, and super easy to pair with my iPhone and fire tablet. Super impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: lisap426

customer_reviews.title: I want to return this
customer_reviews.text: I want to return these. The battery life dies at 20%. Noise has wind sound while talking on phone.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality expected
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I expected. Had something similar. Sound quality isn’t that great and the battery life doesn’t last very long
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The best workout earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Good product all the way around and great for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have the QC30 which is what I am comparing these too. Sound is very good out of these. No not Bose quality but 200 bucks less. Noise cancellation works but again not near as well but 200 bucks cheaper. The neckband design is better than Bose and doesn’t creep around your neck. IPX 5 rating which is nice. Overall I am very impressed with the headset. Good clear sound. You can download and app for additional eq setting and max volume setting. Excellent bang for your buck. I love em.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product, I've had a few lower priced ones that made sound and horrible call quality. This is very comfortable, easy to operate. Call quality and sound are amazing, worth every penny. Battery life is as described, I can usually get through a 10 plus hour shift listening to music or comedy. After a month of use I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Parker

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the ones!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been cycling thru earbuds and headphones, hating one after another until these. Comfortable.. great sound.. call quality.. and ease of use. The only improvement that would earn five stars from me is retractable ear buds. Though they magnetize together.. I don’t like them dangling around getting caught up in clothing and my necklace.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Blair

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for motorcycle riding!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones so i can listen to music while riding my motorcycle. With the ANC on it makes outside noise too quiet! I ride with them on normal mode. They were a bit of a hassle to setup, but after the initial pairing to my phone, they are very easy to use. I can feel all the buttons through my leather gloves as well. The battery lasts a very long time; i usually dont have to charge them for a full two weeks with daily driving.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanx4

customer_reviews.title: Well built, but NC is non-existent
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good sound; bass is decent, and highs and mids are clear Well built, stout, strong wires and ear buds Good placement of buttons Cons: Noise cancelling seems non-existent; I have some cheaper Anker headphones that sound almost as good and still block sound. I'm not sure where the noise cancelling comes in.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Premium material, poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Premium quality material, I am usually big fan of anker stuff but the so far sound quality is just not there in anker headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: The sound is amazing but cords to the earbuds are flimsy
customer_reviews.text: After the twoish months one of the cables have detached and now I only currently have one earbud. I have used the case that came with it and it really didn't protect it from anything. I would like to return it but it's within the return. Or just a refund. But the sound is amazing but the noise cancelling is kind of mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Anker stands behind their products
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headset for an active lifestyle. A few months into the purchase, the bluetooth connection was glitchy. I contacted Anker and they took their product back and sent me a brand new one! Many thanks to Stephen from the Anker customer support team.
customer_reviews.author: KKMG

customer_reviews.title: Noise Cancel is decent
customer_reviews.text: I wear this at my office with the Active Noise Cancel feature on, all the time. It does a pretty good job with reducing the low frequency noises. Of course, it is not as good as Bose or Sony which is 3 times the price. Overall, I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alain Barriere

customer_reviews.title: 1st pair was Not sweat proof.
customer_reviews.text: Editing my first review. My first pair Lasted 5 months. It was not sweat proof. Larger than most and a little clunky because of that however it stays in place better. Sound quality is good. Excellent customer service. They replaced my headphones free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Josh A

customer_reviews.title: If you want an awesome set of earphones.....
customer_reviews.text: I can't answer for sure, they were a gift for my son. I can tell ya that he is absolutely nuts over the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: MrsWabbit

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth stops working in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound quality, there's a slight difference in noise reduction with the noise cancelling on. I absolutely hate that when answering calls it amplifies your surroundings so both you and the other person can hear what's going on around you, it makes it impossible to have a private conversation even in a quiet office. Also, they stopped working less than a year later, I can use the wired function but bluetooth connectivity has completely stopped. I've tried all the "fixes" and tried pairing it with different devices, nothing works, now they're just a $100 pair of clunky uncomfortable wired earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headset. Wish the buds had a home when not in use.
customer_reviews.text: These are great with one deficiency. They work really well for phone calls, and neither I nor the person on the other end has trouble hearing clearly. Music sounds really good with these. Very balanced sound. The battery lasts a really long time. The issue is the dangling earbud cords. I do wish the cords were retractable so I don’t risk damaging the when they aren’t in my ears. Especially for travel when I’m carrying other things, I’d like to have the buds safely stored instead on just hanging.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many types of headphones for work, to listen to music while I work, and for a little bit of ear protection. I would have to say that the Bluetooth Neckband Headphones, Soundcore Life NC by Anker are by far the best I have found. They stay in your ears no matter what you are doing. I move around a lot for work and they have never come out. All others I have used in the past came out constantly, even the ones that advertise they don't. The sound quality is good and so is the battery life. If you are a runner or go to the gym these are the perfect headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kidwell

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound quality a lot but I've only had them 2 months and now they won't charge. For $100.00 that should not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: Need a great pair of headphones for the office and everyday use?
customer_reviews.text: The Good: -Comfortable -Great sound -Noise cancellation helps with noisy environment -Long lasting battery -Easy set up -Good microphone The Bad: -None The Bottom Line: I wear these all day in the office to help me concentrate. They are comfortable and the noise cancellation allows me to have some peace and quiet even in my noisy environment. The set up is super simple in that you just pair the Bluetooth. The sound quality for highs and lows are superb and the microphone is great which allows for great calls. The battery is long lasting and easily goes the whole day with no issues. Overall, I would recommend these headphones for office or general use.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: Great—when they work.
customer_reviews.text: When these work, I love them. I bought these in May and went everywhere with them; wore them everyday all through the day. They had good calls and great better life... Then they abruptly stopped working, and won’t even turn on. I attempted to charge them and the light does not come on anymore. They weren’t dropped, submerged in water, or traumatized. I generally love all Anker products but the short life of these makes me hesitant to buy Anker headphones in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable noise-cancelling ear-buds
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are comfortable and the charge will last several hours. The active noise cancellation is amazing to me for something that isn't over-the-ear. The Mrs. doesn't like that there is a solid horseshoe "yoke" that goes around your neck that connect the earbuds. "Who wants to wear that? It's like an ugly necklace." So - I had to take a star for that, but if you don't MIND that it's like an ugly necklace... you might consider it a 5-star product! I was provided a free sample of this product in exchange for this unbiased review, but I truly like these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Not sweat resistant.
customer_reviews.text: I managed to destroy two of these on a row, in less than a week each. They are not sweat resistant at all. Both sets I had quit connecting to Bluetooth in the middle of a workday.the second one short circuited while on my neck. Not good. The USB cover and buttons are not sealed, allowing sweat to enter and fry the components. I don't believe the IPX rating on these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: great headphones horrible headset
customer_reviews.text: love the sound... love the battery life... hate the mics on this no one can hear me clearly...so annoying... but they are so comfortable I can wear them for music all day...so I would buy them again but not if you need then as your primary mic for on the go conversations
customer_reviews.author: So Many Tools

product_meta.title: Bluetooth Neckband Headphones, Soundcore Life NC, Active Noise Cancelling Headset with Hi-Res Audio, Clear Calls, Transparency Mode, Multi-Device Connection, Flight Mode for Travel, for Home Office
feature_bullets: Crystal-Clear Calls: Four microphones built into the neckband are equipped with uplink-noise- cancellation technology to eliminate background noise and boost voice clarity.
Hi-Res Audio: Custom 12 mm drivers deliver professionally-tuned sound with a rich, immersive sound signature, superior clarity, and Hi-Res audio compatibility.
Active Noise Cancelling: Block out ambient sounds for distraction-free listening, or turn on Transparency to interact with the world around you.
Extended Playtime: Enjoy 10 hours of listening in noise-canceling mode, or increase to 15 in standard mode.
Flight Mode: Use the provided Micro USB-to-3. 5 mm AUX Cable to continue enjoying music at 30000 feet.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars99 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
